name: Just another Roll Playing Game (JaRPG)
description:
Just another Roll Playing Game (JaRPG)

This is a strategy game we made in 50h for the GMTK GameJam. The Theme was "Roll of the dise".

Controls

To start your turn click the button in the bottom right.

First click one of your two heroes

You will get multiple dice and can choose how to use them:

  1. You can use them to boost Defense
  2. You can use them to boost Range
  3. You can use them to buy and Attack

Drag the dice on the corresponding field. The cost off an Attack can be paid by multiple dice.

Press "SPACE" to see the Attack, Defense, Range and Health of all enemies.
Click on a field to move if one of your heros is selected and you have enough Range

Programming by Minemes

Music by Mackes
